charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Hanzo (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Hanzo (S) has been summoned back from the dead in the middle of a battlefield and he is not happy about it. Edo Hanzo (S) will engage anyone that crosses his path as he did when he was alive.

abilities.name: Kusarigama
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Hanzo (S) uses Kusarigama on one enemy dealing 10 damage. That enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. Poison Sickle will deal an additional 10 damage to an enemy effected by this skill.

abilities.name: Poison Sickle
abilities.description: Using Poison Sickle Edo Tensei Hanzo (S) deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. That enemy will be dealt 5 affliction damage permanently. This effect stacks.

abilities.name: Major Summoning Ibuse
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Hanzo (S) uses Major Summoning Ibuse. All enemies will be dealt 20 affliction damage*. All allies will gain 15 destructible defense permanently. This skill becomes Ibuse Toxic Mouth for 5 turns when it is used.

abilities.name: Kusarigama Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Hanzo (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
